lead_paragraph: KAISER--Bertram S.,died of natural causes on January 26, 2016, in Tampa, Florida. He was born in New York City on April 5, 1919 and received Bachelor's and Master's degrees from CCNY. He is survived by his wife, Joy Kaiser, his daughter, Robin Zager, five grandchildren and four great-grandchildren. He was predeceased by his son, Laurence Jay Kaiser in 2005. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAISER, BERTRAM S.
